data.prayer: Father, please give the people in the state of Orenburg access to a Bible in their own language.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Orenburg, Russia
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in Orenburg who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.

data.section_summary: On average, 2 people will die without Jesus in the next hour in Orenburg, Russia.
data.prayer: Jesus, send your gospel to these.
Spirit, encourage every one of the 29,753 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.
Father, guide the church in Orenburg, Russia to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Abaza people. Make the Abaza people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Pour your Spirit out on the 2,033,100 citizens of Orenburg, Russia, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.prayer: Lord, teach the disciples in the state of Orenburg to trust your Word, like a lamp, in the darkness around them.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp for my feet, a light on my path.

data.section_summary:
the state of Orenburg, Russia has a population of 2,033,100.

We estimate Orenburg has 29,753 people who might know Jesus, 1,141,142 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 862,204 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 68 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, protect the overcomers in Orenburg, Russia, so that they will one day sit with Jesus on His throne.
data.verse: He who overcomes, I will give to him to sit down with me on my throne, as I also overcame, and sat down with my Father on his throne.
